attributes.action: Freeze MPs salaries alongside public sector workers salaries
attributes.additional_details: This is to be done so MPs are not only in this fight against coronavirus with the majority of the population but also to help balance the budget in the aftermath of the pandemic.
attributes.background: To discuss freezing MPs salaries alongside other public sector workers and then reinstate the salary raises when other public sector workers get a raise and at same percentage.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:
http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
